channel.title: Help please
channel.description: idk wats wrong with this code if someone can tell me please. it turns ur queststage to 1 when u talk to 666 and gives item / poisones when u talk to 648 w/o queststage 1 and gives red phat with queststage 1 but the part where they talk to you doesnt show up.Code:else if (NPCID == 666) { skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 666; } else if (NPCID == 648) { skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 648;}i put that with all the other ones thenCode:case 666:sendFrame126("get me a r3d phat or 1 k33l y0u w1th my l33t sk1llz", 4904);sendFrame126("MUAHAHAHAHA", 4905); queststage1 = 1; savemoreinfo(); savechar();break;case 648:if (queststage1 == 1) {sendFrame126("lal her u go red phatzzz", 4904);addItem(1038, 1);queststage1 = 2;savemoreinfo();savechar();} else if (queststage1 == 0) {sendMessage("Before you get to say anything the king stabs you. LMFAO!!");PoisonPlayer();}break;also how would i make your player talk back would i make a new case and wat case # would it be. thanks
